member.name: T:dylan.NET.LZW.Compressor
member.remarks: Output files should be the decompressed using this library's decompressor.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.LZW.Compressor.Compress(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compress file at 'srcpath' using LZW and write the output to 'destpath'.
member.remarks: The file paths can be relative or rooted. Relative paths are relative to the current working directory.

member.name: T:dylan.NET.LZW.Decompressor
member.remarks: Input files should be the output of this library's compressor.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.LZW.Decompressor.Decompress(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decompress file at 'srcpath' using LZW and write the output to 'destpath'.
member.remarks: The file paths can be relative or rooted. Relative paths are relative to the current working directory.
